Belthassan is surprised that Anachronox actually knows this is a ship 
and that he knows the location of the storage bay.

Belthassan: Yes the storage bays are that way. The Shadow Destiny has 
been built by Gesper, my younger brother. It is a techno-organic, with 
a format similar to yours and mine. All of us, Tripredacus, are 
techno-organics. We have been sent on Earth for a harvesting mission.

He heads to the storage bay.

Belthassan: I will introduce you first to the other members of the 
team before I present Daemos. He is our commander.

-----------------------------

Daemos: Oh, we did find Firedrill. However, he is not the same person 
anymore. Something we did not anticipate happened in the Renewal 
Chamber. Usually, it heals techno-organics. What I believe happened is 
that the Chamber reformatted him to fit the healing process. He now 
calls himself Anachronox and has pledged alligence to my group. I did 
not wish this to happen. I am sorry about what happened, and I hope 
you can find some forgiveness in you. If we find any solutions, we 
will talk with you about it.

-----------------------------

Gesper: Sure thing Crotale. I'd like to talk with Pacifix now.
